scripts.config:deploy:dev: npm run config:comprehensive:create && npm run config:load-kv -- ./config/comprehensive/complete-config.json --env dev && npm run config:diagnose:dev
scripts.config:deploy:prod: npm run config:comprehensive:create && npm run config:load-kv -- ./config/comprehensive/complete-config.json --env production && npm run config:diagnose:prod
scripts.config:update:core:dev: npm run config -- modules upload-kv core --env dev
scripts.config:update:core:prod: npm run config -- modules upload-kv core --env production
scripts.config:update:storage:dev: npm run config -- modules upload-kv storage --env dev
scripts.config:update:storage:prod: npm run config -- modules upload-kv storage --env production
scripts.config:update:transform:dev: npm run config -- modules upload-kv transform --env dev
scripts.config:update:transform:prod: npm run config -- modules upload-kv transform --env production
scripts.config:update:cache:dev: npm run config -- modules upload-kv cache --env dev
scripts.config:update:cache:prod: npm run config -- modules upload-kv cache --env production
scripts.config:fix-all:prod: npm run config:deploy:prod && npm run config:diagnose:prod
scripts.config:set-current:dev: npm run config -- set-current v1 --env dev
scripts.config:set-current:prod: npm run config -- set-current v1 --env production
